name: LikeParrot
author: SYSTEMICO

sections.description:
Chat service that allows you to connect in real time with users of your website. Take customer service to a higher level in an online environment.
Chat with them and generate long-term relationships with Likeparrot.

Arbitrary section

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Menu->LikeParrot Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Insert your LikeParrot username (user@likeparrot.com) on textbox and press SAVE or create a free account on sign up free button.
sections.faq:
For any additional information

contact a virtual agent on https://likeparrot.com
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • Update and clean up background code.
  • Optimize your conversations.

screenshots.caption: Meet real-time places your customers visit - Identify the pages you are browsing your users helps you identify patterns of behavior like to know what country you visit.

Create instances of care and ensures compliance with requirements of your customers - With the module you can open applications care cases to solve problems that require organized processes or specialized personnel compleentario to process customer ..

Generate customer databases - Automatically collects information from your visitors to form a list of people interested in your products and services. Additionally you can learn the history of conversations, interest and all information you require.

Sets response templates - common questions that identify the system stores, when a customer makes the question the system automatically suggests the answer to the virtual agent to accelerate and ensure attention.

Permanent Statistics - Always know the language of visitors, service level, origin and number of visits, analysis of management applications, among other analyzes that evolve according to your business need.
Customer Service 24 hours automated intelligent attention - A Bot will take control of each account of your virtual agents to serve your customers without human interaction.
